title: For Sale -- Old Mill Wajo & other high-grade HOF T206 HOF'ers with Rare Backs
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: For Sale -- Old Mill Wajo & other high-grade HOF T206 HOF'ers with Rare Backs
posts.post_content:
This is one of several high-graded, rarer-backed, T206 HOFers I am listing for sale, so please check back for additional listings.  I am also willing to entertain trade offers as well as a bulk purchase/larger trade.  I will not return any inquiry that mentions the phrase "SMR".  Feel free to email me @ rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com.

[STRIKE]T206 Lajoie w/bat Tolstoi SGC 70.  This is the highest graded example of the only 15 graded on the combined SGC/PSA pop reports. Great centering, clear front and back pictures.  This is a collector's card.  Last known comp  of a 5 was $1,050 in 2011.[/STRIKE]

SOLD, PayPal FF

See below for other fair deals on real solid HOF rare-backs.

posts.post_title: T206 Walter Johnson Pitching Old Mill SGC 60
posts.post_content:
T206 Walter Johnson Old Mill SGC 60.  One of the higher-known graded examples of this blue-chip HOFer's pitching pose with an Old Mill back.  Near perfect front centering and a very clean back.  Last exact comp was $2,280 at Heritage in May of 2017.  

$2,400.00, Paypal FF

T206 Vic Willis Portrait, Brown Hindu, SGC 60.  This is the highest graded example of the mere 16 examples listed on the combined SGC/PSA pop report.  This card is amazingly clean and the valuable Hindu back is well-centered and clear.  In 2012, a PSA 4.5 example sold for $2,750.00.

$3,000, PayPal FF

posts.post_title: T206 Chief Bender w/Trees, Cycle 350, PSA 6
posts.post_content:
T206 Chief Bender w/Trees, Cycle 350, PSA 6.  Very Tough front/back combo.  This is tied for highest graded of the mere 7, Cycle 350, examples of this front-pose listed on the combined SGC/PSA pop report.  This exact card was sold in Heritage Auction in July of 2016 for $1,434.00 (I was not the buyer), and I later bought it for $1,700.00.

$1,800.00, PayPal FF

posts.post_title: T206 M Brown, Chicago Shirt, EPDG PSA 6
posts.post_content:
T206 "Three-Finger" Mordecai Brown, Chicago on Shirt, EPDG PSA 6.  Tied for highest graded of the 20+/- on the combined SGC/PSA pop report.  A true collector's card, there is almost nothing to knit-pick about this card - great front centering, clarity and registration and the back is clean, but a bit OC left-right. A bought this on ebay three months ago for $1,810 (and PWCC charged me an arm and leg on shipping...)

$1,950.00, PayPal FF

posts.post_title: T206 Home Run Baker, Tolstoi SGC 60
posts.post_content:
T206 Frank "Home Run" Baker, Tolstoi SGC 60.  One of the highest graded examples of the mere 19 graded examples on the combined SGC/PSA pop report.  Just a very solid example of an HOFer with a rarer T206 back.  Last example graded a 5 was a PSA 5 sold in 2013 for $833.

$840.00, PayPal FF

posts.post_title: T206 McGraw, Glove at Hip, American Beauty 460 SGC 60
posts.post_content:
T206 McGraw, Glove at Hip, American Beauty 460 SGC 60.  Tied for highest graded of the examples listed on the combined SGC/PSA pop report.  A very solid example of an HOFer with a rarer T206 back.  

$1,000.00, PayPal FF
